metadata.description: Redone Home WiFi Plans - Complete information for customer service
metadata.instructions: Use this data to answer customer questions about home WiFi plans, pricing, features, and recommendations

plans.name: 5G homeWiFi88
plans.tagline: Complete home WiFi solution with 5G router

plans.name: 5G homeWiFi68
plans.tagline: Flexible home WiFi for your own router

device.requirement: Customer must provide own 4G/5G compatible router

comparison.contractDifference: 12 months longer for device plan (24 vs 12)
comparison.dataAllocation: Both plans offer same 1TB monthly data
comparison.mainDifference: Device plan includes FREE 5G router, SIM-only requires own router

commonQuestions.whichPlanIsBetter: homeWiFi88 if you need a router, homeWiFi68 if you already have one
commonQuestions.canIUpgrade: Yes, you can upgrade from SIM-only to device plan
commonQuestions.dataRollover: No, unused data does not roll over to next month
commonQuestions.coverage: Both plans work on 4G and 5G networks nationwide where available
commonQuestions.multipleDevices: Yes, both plans support multiple device connections through WiFi

newCustomer.reason: Includes everything needed to get started with home internet

existingRouterOwner.reason: Save RM20/month and enjoy shorter contract

budgetConscious.reason: Lower monthly cost and shorter commitment

technicalRequirements.forDevicePlan: Just need a power outlet for the router
technicalRequirements.forSimOnly: Must have 4G/5G compatible router with SIM slot
technicalRequirements.networkCompatibility: Plans work on redONE's 4G and 5G networks

notes.dataUsage: 1TB = 1000GB, sufficient for streaming, gaming, and work from home
notes.fairUsagePolicy: Standard FUP applies after excessive usage
notes.routerReturn: Device plan router must be returned if contract terminated early
